thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Pino Mandile
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Pino Mandile

author: Pino Mandile
title: Pino Mandile
text:
“I bought a lot of items by Banggood and I they was always good quality products. Generally prices are much cheaper than other stores, but the most important If there is any problems the customer support is easy to contact and generally fast respond time.
Last time I had a little problem, Banggood quickly solved the problem. Reliability and availability forever.
Delivery times are a little long for Italy, but It's worth.
Pinuzzo”
